name: You Start With Nothing - LD45
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 45 in 48 hours.

You have nothing.
You are lost in the wilderness.
You are an alien investigator.
You like mushrooms + plants (but not the poisonous ones).
You move with wasd.
You try not to die of cold or hunger!
You look with mouse and interact with left mouse.
You can crawl with ctrl and run with shift.
You like to interact with eggs. Eggs know crafting!
You feel like you are ready to play!

Have fun and let me know what you think!

pro tip: crafting the torch stops you getting cold as fast!

note: should be played in 16x9 (if you can 1920x1080)
